Articles.Content: Manley's taken it for a test drive:
Where do people get all this info about B9? The original thread has been closed for at least few weeks.

Where do people get all this info about B9? The original thread has been closed for at least few weeks.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/73621-B9-5-0-pre-release-%28with-download%29
the new b9 mod is making me crash so much more often, not worth it for what it adds imho

Everyone keeps talking about the HX, but a lot of the other textures have been improved too. The HX is going to be one of those things people play with and end up deleting to save RAM. They are beautiful parts, but they are just too big to be all that useful. You can barely even fit one or two in the SPH/VAB.

Edited August 31, 2014 by Alshain
The way he said stupid_chris nearly sounded like a sincere insult, I approve
Bumped over to General Addon Affairs, the place to discuss Addons, and general affairs relating to said Addons.

It's SO BIG!!!

Seriously these parts would only be useful for either Macey dean wannabes or interstellar voyages.
